resources.string: An in-app QA and design\nreview menu with a built-in\nplugin system
Shake phone to expand Hyperion plugins menu
Press to expand the menu manually
Add or remove plugins based on your workflow
Measure the distance between any view on the screen.
Tap and hold to inspect elements embedded inside of a group.
Read, write, delete, or share the contents of your app\'s file system for debugging file IO functionality.
Record, save, and share interactions from within the app.
Check your animation performance by listening for dropped frames.
